parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the active air flap system can cause engine overheating, which can lead to engine damage, reduced performance, and potentially cause a breakdown or accident.
symptoms: upper and lower radiator blinds/actuators not working

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Upper and Lower Radiator Blinds Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the upper and lower radiator blinds can cause engine overheating, which can lead to engine damage, reduced performance, and potentially cause a breakdown or accident.
symptoms: upper and lower radiator blinds/actuators not working

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden shattering of the sunroof can cause injury to occupants from shattered glass and distract the driver, potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: without any prior impact or warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Active PDC system can increase the risk of accidents or damage to the vehicle, as it is designed to assist the driver in avoiding collisions.
symptoms: The Active PDC system fails to activate
and the dealer may not document the failures or provide a satisfactory explanation.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The freezing of the audio control system can cause a loss of audio functionality, which can be a distraction to the driver and potentially lead to an accident.
symptoms: volume cannot be adjusted using gesture commands
and the dashboard display does not show any attempt to increase volume.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Flawed Automatic Park Distance Control System (PDC)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inconsistent performance of the PDC system can cause accidents or near-misses, especially at low speeds, due to the system's failure to accurately detect obstacles or provide timely warnings.
symptoms: sometimes too early or too late
and occasionally fails to activate at all
requiring manual intervention to activate the sensors.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the adaptive cruise control system can lead to accidents or near-miss collisions, as the vehicle may not detect or respond to other vehicles or pedestrians in its path, requiring driver intervention to avoid a collision.
symptoms: The vehicle fails to detect other vehicles or pedestrians

especially when merging lanes or switching lanes; the vehicle does not slow down or stop in response to other vehicles or pedestrians; the collision alarm sounds unnecessarily; the vehicle accelerates to reach target speed despite detecting another vehicle in front; the vehicle fails to detect parked vehicles in adjacent lanes.
